document_data.mainbody:
EFAULTSORT:Huntsilver, Cordryn}}
'''Cordryn Huntsilver''', was a noble from [[Cormyr]]. He was involved with [[Gaspar Cormaeril]] and [[Aunadar Bleth]] in the [[Abraxus affair]] <ref>, Cordyn was Maestoon's last surviving son, was exiled and disinherited for his involvement in the Abraxus Affair<ref>
